thread.title: Mesmerizing Background Projections From the Iconic Pink Floyd Tours in 1974 and 1975
thread.title_full: Mesmerizing Background Projections From the Iconic Pink Floyd Tours in 1974 and 1975

author: Lori Dorn
title: Mesmerizing Background Projections From the Iconic Pink Floyd Tours in 1974 and 1975

organizations.name: boing boing  related laughing squid posts pink floyd

text:
Film buff David Monreal posted the gorgeously mesmerizing background projections that were created by the very talented Ian Emes for Pink Floyd to show during their French summer tour in 1974 and the North American “ Wish You Were Here Tour ” in 1975 .

via Boing Boing 
Related Laughing Squid Posts Pink Floyd: The Story of Wish You Were Here ‘A Hotel Full of Secrets’, A Mesmerizing Musical Mashup That Combines Pink Floyd With The Eagles Childish Side of the Moon by Brandon Ortwein, Inspired by Pink Floyd
